Oh man! Fucking George Lucas needs to look in the mirror and call himself a dumbass every day for the rest of his life, this shit is worse than Jar-Jar Binks' anal warts...ugh!
Video Quality terrible. Looks like someone cammed a TV screen.

@GoliathMKV & U_Rebel_Scum: George Lucas doesn't seem to have had anything to do with this, so he's probably more like "Told you so"... As for episode VI, he didn't direct that either, just check IMDb!

To anyone complaining about the quality -- this was never released in any format.  So the only copies that exist were VHS recordings made of the original broadcast.  Expect the quality to be that of a homemade VHS copied repeatedly for over 20 years before being converted to digital.  

And George Lucas most definitely had nothing to do with this, he leased the rights to the characters to a production company that made variety shows.  Of all the things to hate Lucas for, this isn't one of them.
This version is 720x480@30fps, 1:03, no commericals. Hoping the 3.4gb version is better, the commericals are half the fun.

sorry, the run length is actually 1:22, even though windows reports it as 1:47. This version from the holiday special only section of the 3.4gb version thats on here, but features a much shorter promo for star wars at the end.
